article:
'Versus' is the diffusion line of noted Italian fashion house Versace. It began
in 1989 as the first of many diffusion lines by the house, a gift by the founder
Gianni Versace to his sister, Donatella Versace. After closing in 2005,
Donatella resurrected it with a capsule collection of accessories designed by
emerging British designer Christopher Kane, who is now co-creative director with
Donatella.
categories: Articles created via the Article Wizard
